snippet: President Obama issued pardons on Friday to 17 convicted felons, most of whose offenses were small-scale crimes committed many years ago.
abstract: Pres Obama issues pardons to 17 convicted felons, making first use of his clemency powers in his second term; offenses were largely small-scale crimes many years ago, and 12 of the people had not been sentenced to serve time in prison.
lead_paragraph: President Obama issued pardons on Friday to 17 convicted felons, most of whose offenses were small-scale crimes committed many years ago.

headline.seo: Obama Pardons 17 Felons, First in His Second Term
headline.main: Obama Pardons 17 Felons, First in His Second Term
headline.print_headline: Obama Pardons 17 Felons, First in His Second Term
